title: 3 and Out - Brian Kelly to LSU Bombshell, RIP Russ/Pete Era, Riley/Oklahoma Ugly Divorce, Packers Bully Ball, Let Kellen Coach, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brian Kelly to LSU Bombshell, RIP Russ/Pete Era, Riley/Oklahoma Ugly Divorce, Packers Bully Ball, Let Kellen Coach, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the bombshell news of Brian Kelly leaving Notre Dame to LSU, and if the odd North/South marriage will work. Then he explains why it's officially time to blow up the Pete Carroll/Russell Wilson Seahawks, why the details of the Lincoln Riley contract show USC is finally committed, why the ugly divorce between Riley and Oklahoma is unavoidable, what makes this version of the Packers the Super Bowl favorite, and why the Cowboys should have used Mike McCarthy's COVID absence to audition Kellen Moore as the head coach. He also gives his take on Kirk Cousins' narrative reinforcing loss to the Niners, why rookie HC Brandon Staley is showing his inexperience during the Chargers losing streak. Finally, he answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
